LanguageData.MakeFruitYogurt_Bulk.description: Cook yogurts from milk or soy milk and some fruits. Produces 10.

LanguageData.MakeChocoMilk_Bulk.description: Mix milk or soy milk with chocolate for tastier beverages. Produces 10.
